document.masterDocTitle: A catalogue and taxonomic keys of the Subfamily Nicomachinae (Polychaeta: Maldanidae) of the world

Achari, 1970
: 269
–273, figs. 1 a–f, 2 a–h. Holotype : CMFRI 155 . Paratypes : CMFRI 156 . Type locality: Gulf of Mannar, India .
Geographic distribution: Known only from the type locality.

subSubSection.paragraph: Geographic distribution: Western Atlantic, from Ireland to Canary Islands; Mediterranean and Black Sea; Eastern Pacific; Antarctic Ocean.
